column2: This golden ring was forged by the Nagrathi Elf Gorthauron, the first Dark Lord of the Oruk Empire. It endows its owner with great power, but there are rumors that it has it's own will... and seeking for it's rightful owner.

This silver ring was forged by Celebrinquar, an Aldari elf who rebelled against the power of Gorthauron and assumed the title of the Bright Lord. A powerful ring that bestows great power... and rarely remains in the hands of the unworthy.
